item.title: C++ Tutorial
item.description: Source: tutorials point c++ is a middle-level programming language developed by Bjarne Stroustrup starting in 1979 at Bell Labs. c++ runs on a variety of platforms, such as Windows, Mac OS, and the various versions of UNIX. This c++ tutorial adopts a simple and practical approach to describe the concepts of C++ for beginners to advanded software engineers. Why to Learn C++ c++ is a MUST for students and working professionals to become a great Software Engineer.
